explains: n. 健忘症，[内科] 记忆缺失

sentences.en: People suffering from amnesia don't forget their general knowledge of objects.
sentences.cn: 患有失忆症的人不会忘记他们对物品的常识。

sentences.en: What are the reasons for childhood amnesia?
sentences.cn: 儿童患健忘症的原因有哪些？

sentences.en: It is called childhood amnesia and was first documented in 1893.
sentences.cn: 它被称为儿童健忘症，最早记录于1893年。
